quote.#text:
An individual who has been in full-time attendance at an
			 elementary or secondary school shall, during a succeeding period of
			 nonattendance at such school, be deemed to be a full-time secondary-school
			 student if (i) such period is 4 calendar months or less, and (ii) the
			 individual shows to the satisfaction of the Commissioner that he intends to be
			 in full-time attendance at a post-secondary educational institution immediately
			 following such period.
